channel.title: Kfir Gisman Blogs
channel.description: Technical articles about Python, FastAPI, DevOps, and more by Kfir Gisman.

item.title: From Passive FastAPI Developer to Real FastAPI Engineer - Part 1
item.description: Understanding ASGI by Breaking Down an HTTP Request. Learn how FastAPI uses ASGI for async web development.

item.title: From Passive FastAPI Developer to Real FastAPI Engineer - Part 2
item.description: Continuing the series on FastAPI and ASGI. Advanced concepts, best practices, and performance tips.

item.title: From Passive FastAPI Developer to Real FastAPI Engineer â€“ Part 3: Middleware and Background Tasks
item.description: Exploring ASGI middleware, background tasks, and advanced request/response patterns in FastAPI. Learn how middleware intercepts requests and how background tasks enable non-blocking workloads.
